title: Shaun Bailey – 2021 Comments on Clapham Common Clashes
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Shaun Bailey, the Conservative’s Party candidate to be London Mayor, on 14 March 2021.
content: If Sadiq Khan wasn’t involved in tonight’s operational decision making, given the significance of tonight’s vigil, he should have made sure he was. If he was involved – he has serious questions to answer.
